About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

Silviu Hoza, I'm a web developer, with a strong passion for coding. I'ved learned to code on my one, with self taughting, because I wanted to change my life first, and in the same time to provide good services to other people. Before finding this passion for coding, I graduated from two University, first was The Psychology and the second was focused on The Human and Social Sciences. As you can see I have a inclination to the people and I want to help others with my services. One of my goal is to bring thankfulness to the people that I meet everyday, that's way I'm trying to provide high quality services.

Honesty

The honesty is something that all of us are trying to find in others, and when we found such o person which is characterized by this feature, we became quiet and happy, that we would be sure on our future relations.

Strong will

Front End Developer

When we want to do something in our life we must have the will, to do that, because if we wouldn't persevere in our goals, we would never achieve them, that's why I try to underscore this feature in my character.

Webworks

Graphic Designer
